17  
18  package org.apache.shardingsphere.test.it.sql.parser.external;
19  
20  import com.google.common.base.Preconditions;
21  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.exception.core.external.ShardingSphereExternalException;
22  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.spi.type.typed.TypedSPILoader;
23  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.api.CacheOption;
24  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.api.SQLParserEngine;
25  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.api.SQLStatementVisitorEngine;
26  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.core.ParseASTNode;
27  import org.apache.shardingsphere.test.it.sql.parser.external.env.SQLParserExternalITEnvironment;
28  import org.apache.shardingsphere.test.it.sql.parser.external.result.SQLParseResultReporter;
29  import org.apache.shardingsphere.test.it.sql.parser.external.result.SQLParseResultReporterCreator;
30  import org.apache.shardingsphere.test.it.sql.parser.loader.ExternalCaseSettings;
31  import org.apache.shardingsphere.test.loader.ExternalSQLTestParameter;
32  import org.apache.shardingsphere.test.loader.TestParameterLoadTemplate;
33  import org.apache.shardingsphere.test.loader.TestParameterLoader;
34  import org.apache.shardingsphere.test.loader.strategy.TestParameterLoadStrategy;
35  import org.apache.shardingsphere.test.loader.strategy.impl.GitHubTestParameterLoadStrategy;
36  import org.junit.jupiter.api.condition.EnabledIf;
37  import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext;
38  import org.junit.jupiter.api.parallel.Execution;
39  import org.junit.jupiter.api.parallel.ExecutionMode;
40  import org.junit.jupiter.params.ParameterizedTest;
41  import org.junit.jupiter.params.provider.Arguments;
42  import org.junit.jupiter.params.provider.ArgumentsProvider;
43  import org.junit.jupiter.params.provider.ArgumentsSource;
44  
45  import java.io.IOException;
46  import java.net.URI;
47  import java.util.stream.Stream;
48  
49  public abstract class ExternalSQLParserIT {
50      
51      @ParameterizedTest(name = "{0} ({1}) -> {2}")
52      @EnabledIf("isEnabled")
53      @ArgumentsSource(TestCaseArgumentsProvider.class)
54      @Execution(ExecutionMode.CONCURRENT)
55      void assertParseSQL(final String sqlCaseId, final String databaseType, final String sql, final String reportType) throws IOException {
56          boolean isSuccess = false;
57          try (
58                  SQLParseResultReporter resultReporter = TypedSPILoader.getService(SQLParseResultReporterCreator.class, reportType)
59                          .create(databaseType, SQLParserExternalITEnvironment.getInstance().getResultPath())) {
60              try {
61                  ParseASTNode parseASTNode = new SQLParserEngine(databaseType, new CacheOption(128, 1024L)).parse(sql, false);
62                  new SQLStatementVisitorEngine(databaseType).visit(parseASTNode);
63                  isSuccess = true;
64              } catch (final ShardingSphereExternalException | ClassCastException | IllegalArgumentException | IndexOutOfBoundsException ignore) {
65              } finally {
66                  resultReporter.printResult(sqlCaseId, databaseType, isSuccess, sql);
67              }
68          }
69      }
70      
71      private static boolean isEnabled() {
72          return SQLParserExternalITEnvironment.getInstance().isSqlParserITEnabled();
73      }
74      
75      private static class TestCaseArgumentsProvider implements ArgumentsProvider {
76          
77          @Override
78          public Stream<? extends Arguments> provideArguments(final ExtensionContext extensionContext) throws ReflectiveOperationException {
79              ExternalCaseSettings settings = extensionContext.getRequiredTestClass().getAnnotation(ExternalCaseSettings.class);
80              Preconditions.checkNotNull(settings, "Annotation ExternalSQLParserITSettings is required.");
81              return getTestParameters(settings).map(each -> Arguments.of(each.getSqlCaseId(), each.getDatabaseType(), each.getSql(), each.getReportType()));
82          }
83          
84          private Stream<ExternalSQLTestParameter> getTestParameters(final ExternalCaseSettings settings) throws ReflectiveOperationException {
85              TestParameterLoadStrategy loadStrategy = new GitHubTestParameterLoadStrategy();
86              URI sqlCaseURI = URI.create(settings.caseURL());
87              URI resultURI = URI.create(settings.resultURL());
88              TestParameterLoadTemplate loadTemplate = settings.template().getConstructor().newInstance();
89              TestParameterLoader loader = new TestParameterLoader(loadStrategy, loadTemplate);
90              return loader.load(sqlCaseURI, resultURI, settings.value(), settings.reportType());
91          }
92      }
93  }
